entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Montréal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Trudeau Int'l Airport 04:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: SW 44 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
